commands.name: az boards area team add
commands.syntax:
az boards area team add --path
                        --team
                        [--detect {false, true}]
                        [--include-sub-areas {false, true}]
                        [--org]
                        [--project]
                        [--set-as-default]

commands.name: az boards area team list
commands.syntax:
az boards area team list --team
                         [--detect {false, true}]
                         [--org]
                         [--project]

commands.name: az boards area team remove
commands.syntax:
az boards area team remove --path
                           --team
                           [--detect {false, true}]
                           [--org]
                           [--project]

commands.name: az boards area team update
commands.syntax:
az boards area team update --path
                           --team
                           [--detect {false, true}]
                           [--include-sub-areas {false, true}]
                           [--org]
                           [--project]
                           [--set-as-default]
